Class VirtualTank

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.fluid.VirtualTank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraftforge.fluids.IFluidTank

    public class VirtualTank
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.minecraftforge.fluids.IFluidTank
    A tank that acts as a proxy to a collection of other tanks.

                   boolean spreadEvenly)
        Make a new tank instance.
        Parameters:
        tankProvider - The dynamic provider of tanks.
        spreadEvenly - If the filling and draining should happen evenly across all tanks.
